text:
You start automatically in the STATE LEVEL panel.
Check the other panels to look into other level analyses.
Choose from 50 states including the District of Columbia to visualize state trends and select from four narrative voice options to refine the heat map.
Some graphs are interactive. Use the mouse to hover or zoom. Reset settings in the upper right.
Always look out for the <b>option buttons under graphs and tables. Most of ElectionGPT functionality is here! <b>
That's it. Enjoy using ElectionGPT and don't hesitate to contact us if you have suggestions or comments.
